eu.simonpercic.java.collectionhelper

Class CollectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.simonpercic.java.collectionhelper.CollectionHelper

  • public class CollectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection helper.

    A set of static utility methods to simplify filtering and querying Java's Collections. A limited subset of .NET framework's LINQ Enumerable Methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollectionHelper()

      • singleOrNull

        public static <T> T singleOrNull(java.util.Collection<T> items,
                 IPredicate<T> predicate)
        Returns the only element from a collection that matches the given predicate or null if such element is not found. Throws a InvalidOperationException if there is more than 1 element matching the predicate.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of elements in the source collection
        Parameters:
        items - source items
        predicate - predicate function
        Returns:
        the only element that matches the given predicate or null if such element is not found
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - if there is more than 1 element matching the predicate
